Name: The far Kingdoms: Winter Solitaire
About the game: In this magical Solitaire game you must defeat the Ice Queen before the land is sealed in eternal winter! The Ice Queen, filled with anger and bent on revenge has cast a cold harsh winter upon the kingdoms! Princess Arianna is our last hope, but she needs your help in her difficult journey. Only you can control the power of the magic cards. Display your solitaire skills and aid the Princess in her mission to defeat the Ice Queen before the land is sealed in eternal winter! Keep it cool and play your cards right! - 50 great solitaire levels - Unlock uprades an powerups - Charge your royal amulet - Combination of solitaire and hidden objects - Defeat the Ice Queen!
